actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide social security coverage for work performed in prison industries and other services performed for renumeration by inmates of penal institutions.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide social security coverage for work performed in prison industries by inmates.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide social security coverage for work performed in prison industries and other services performed for renumeration by inmates of penal institutions.
